objects.src: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080'><defs><linearGradient id='bg1' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#1A365D'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#2A466D'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='bg2' x1='100%' y1='0%' x2='0%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#F5F5F5'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#E0E0E0'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#bg1)'/><path d='M1080 0 L450 0 L1080 630 Z' fill='#FFD700' opacity='0.1'/><path d='M1080 0 L0 1080 L1080 1080 Z' fill='url(#bg2)'/><g transform='rotate(-45, 540, 540)'><line x1='0' y1='540' x2='1080' y2='540' stroke='#FFD700' stroke-width='1' opacity='0.3'/><line x1='0' y1='580' x2='1080' y2='580' stroke='#FFD700' stroke-width='1' opacity='0.3'/><line x1='0' y1='620' x2='1080' y2='620' stroke='#FFD700' stroke-width='1' opacity='0.3'/></g><circle cx='100' cy='100' r='20' fill='#FFD700' opacity='0.1'/><circle cx='150' cy='150' r='10' fill='#FFD700' opacity='0.1'/><circle cx='980' cy='980' r='20' fill='#1A365D' opacity='0.1'/><circle cx='930' cy='930' r='10' fill='#1A365D' opacity='0.1'/></svg>

objects.text:
• Water resistant design
• 14 pockets, 3 compartments
• Fits 16" laptop & 11" iPad Pro
• Expandable for extra 8L space

product_details.description:
• Crafted with reverse coated polyester and microfibre. 
  • Water resistant. 
  • 14 pockets. 3 compartments. Designed to organise your work days and staycations. 
  • Front compartment comes with a retractable key holder, large slip pockets, pen pockets and a zippered pocket. 
  • Main compartment opens flat, to give you full access to your items. 
  • Comes with a spill-proof pocket for your toiletries. 
  • Elastic slip pockets along the walls of your backpack. 
  • Zippered mesh storage compartment makes room for your weekend staycation. 
  • Comes with an expansion system, which you can unzip to get an additional 8L of packing space. 
  • Shock-proof tech compartment that opens flat and protects your tech from those accidental drops. Fits up to a 16” laptop and an 11” iPad Pro. 
  • Contoured bottle pocket on the side for your water bottle/umbrella.
  • Quick access zippered pocket at the top. 
  • Hidden passport pocket at the back. 
  • Padded shoulder straps designed for all day comfort. 
  • Luggage sleeve that secures to any Mokobara luggage. 
  • Dedicated rain cover compartment at the bottom. Use the rain cover to protect your Mokobara from the rains.
  • Size - 44 x 29 x 23 cm

banner_details:
This banner features a premium product advertisement layout, ideal for a fashion or tech accessory like a backpack. The background comprises a two-tone diagonal design with a rich navy-to-blue gradient on one side and a soft gray gradient on the other, intersected by thin golden diagonal lines, creating an elegant and modern contrast.

A bold text layer titled *heading* in crisp white is used for the main product name, supported by the *subheading* in vibrant yellow, emphasizing the product class and capacity. Below this, the *description* layer delivers product highlights in a clean bullet list.

On the lower left, the *price* text layer is large and bold to capture attention instantly. Just beneath, a golden-yellow rectangle named *cta_button* houses the call-to-action *cta* text "SHOP NOW" in navy blue — driving customer interaction.

A high-quality product image labeled *product_image* is prominently placed on the right side to balance the textual content and visually anchor the banner.

**Color Palette:**
- Navy Blue: #1A365D
- Pale Blue-Gray: #F5F5F5
- Soft Gray: #E0E0E0
- Golden Yellow: #FFD700
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image features a sophisticated and sleek color palette dominated by navy blue (#2C3E50), which conveys reliability and professionalism. A contrasting element is introduced with a vibrant yellow-orange handle accent (#F5A623), adding visual interest and energy to the design. Deep black (#1C1C1C) is used for the straps and label tag, anchoring the design with a modern finish. The muted dark gray graphic (#4A4A4A) on the front subtly blends into the blue base, maintaining elegance while showcasing branding. This sophisticated contrast and color harmony make it ideal for a bold yet minimal advertisement banner targeting urban professionals.
